pages.text: If you need general support, have questions, suggestions, want to report a weird issue, crash, error, or anything else, please post it in the issue tracker, where it is handled.$(br2)Please do not post any of that in $(l:discord)Discord$() or anywhere else.$(br)Those are kept for general posting, community activity, announcements and more.
In order to get to the issue tracker page, please click the link bellow.$(br2)Please make sure you are registered to GitHub in order to post new issues.$(br2) $(br2)           ⇩ ⇩ ⇩
